command.description: Reloads the current active View or Editor.
command.name: Update

command.description: Mark all News of the currently displayed Feed as Read
command.name: Mark All Read

command.description: Send the link of the selected element as E-Mail.
command.name: Send Link

command.description: Toggle Read State of selected News
command.name: Toggle Read State

command.description: Aggregate all news of the selected folder.
command.name: Aggregate News

command.description: Show or Hide the Bookmarks View
command.name: Toggle Bookmarks

command.description: Navigate to the next Bookmark Set
command.name: Next Bookmark Set

command.description: Navigate to the previous Bookmark Set
command.name: Previous Bookmark Set

command.description: Select a Tab from all Opened Tabs
command.name: Select Tab

command.description: Opens a dialog to manage all news filters.
command.name: News Filters

command.description: Create a new filter from a selected news.
command.name: Create Filter

command.description: Create a new filter from a selected bookmark or folder.
command.name: Filter News

command.description: Assign Labels for a selection of News
command.name: Assign Labels

command.description: Show or hide headlines from the feed view.
command.name: Toggle Headlines

command.description: Show pending feed updates and downloads.
command.name: Downloads & Activity

command.description: Search for Feeds based on Keywords.
command.name: Find more Feeds

property.name: aboutText
property.value:

scheme.description: This is the RSSOwl Keys Scheme
scheme.name: RSSOwl Keys

context.description: This context is reserved for bindings in RSSOwl.
context.name: In RSSOwl

fontDefinition.label: News Text Font
fontDefinition.description: The news text font is used to display the contents of a news.

fontDefinition.label: Headlines Font
fontDefinition.description: The headlines font is used to display the headlines of a feed.

fontDefinition.label: Bookmark Explorer Font
fontDefinition.description: The bookmark explorer font is used in the bookmark explorer to display all folders, bookmarks and saved searches.

colorDefinition.label: Sticky News Background
colorDefinition.description: The sticky news background color is used as background color for all sticky news including the bookmark that the news is belonging to.

fontDefinition.label: Notification Popup Font
fontDefinition.description: The notification popup font is used in the notification when news are coming in.

colorDefinition.label: Search Result Background
colorDefinition.description: The search result background color is used when the words of a search are highlighted inside the news content.

newsAction.description: Shows matching News in the Notifier Pop-Up
newsAction.name: Show News in Notifier

newsAction.description: Downloads Attachments (e.g. Podcasts) from matching news if present
newsAction.name: Download Attachments
